item.title: A Designer's Guide to GDPR
item.description: Originally written for and edited by Prolific Interactive Disclaimer: Nobody who contributed to this overview of GDPR or the accompanying checklist is a lawyer. This does not constitute as legal advice. This is by no means an exhaustive list. Please consult a legal professional for specific questions. Recall the Great Privacy Update of 2018: Your inbox was flooded with emails from apps and websites you didnâ€™t even remember having an account with, and maybe for the first time in history, privacy policies became a meme.
